content.raw:
Hello Pierre:

I'm checking the Ubuntu version of ignitions-msgs (`1.0.0+dfsg1-5`) and it seems to have built using protobuf3 according to the build log: https://launchpadlibrarian.net/360601196/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-amd64.ignition-msgs_1.0.0+dfsg1-5_BUILDING.txt.gz . From the top of my head, we should not have anything in Bionic 18.04 built using the protobuf 2.x series.
content.html:
Hello Pierre:

I'm checking the Ubuntu version of ignitions-msgs (1.0.0+dfsg1-5) and it seems to have built using protobuf3 according to the build log: https://launchpadlibrarian.net/360601196/buildlog_ubuntu-bionic-amd64.ignition-msgs_1.0.0+dfsg1-5_BUILDING.txt.gz . From the top of my head, we should not have anything in Bionic 18.04 built using the protobuf 2.x series.
